paragraph.paragraph:
EiffelStudio editor provides a search functionality. To search an expression in the edited text, you can either use the
../10_browsing_tools/60_search_tool.xml Search tool or use a set of keyboard accelerators available directly from the editor. From the editor, you can:

item.paragraph:
Search the next occurrence of the last searched pattern. To do so, press "F3". You can change this key binding in
../85_preferences/20_preferences_reference/20_tools/30_editor/20_keyboard_shortcuts_preferences.xml the preferences . If you press "F3" as some text is selected, the editor will highlight the next occurrence of this text, if any. You can change this behavior in
../85_preferences/20_preferences_reference/20_tools/30_editor/20_keyboard_shortcuts_preferences.xml the preferences .

Search the previous occurrence of the last searched pattern. To do so, press "Shift+F3". You can change this key binding in
../85_preferences/20_preferences_reference/20_tools/30_editor/20_keyboard_shortcuts_preferences.xml the preferences too.
